assemblyInfo.assemblyMethod: Hifiasm + Hi-C phasing v. 0.16.1 + galaxy3; yahs v. 1.2a.2 + galaxy0; Bionano Solve v. 3.7.0 + galaxy0

bioprojects.title: Stegostoma tigrinum (zebra shark) genome, sSteTig4, haplotype 2

description.comment: The zebra shark (Stegostoma tigrinum) is a species of carpet shark and the sole member of the family Stegostomatidae. It is found throughout the tropical Indo-Pacific, frequenting coral reefs and sandy flats (from Wikipedia entry). This sample of an animal in the Georgia Acqarium, of an animal originally from Australia, was procured by Kady Lyons and Gavin Naylor, to generate a high-quality reference genome for the Vertebrate Genomes Project (VGP). Sequencing and genome assembly were conducted at the Vertebrate Genomes Lab (VGL) at the Rockefeller University, led by Olivier Fedrigo and Erich D. Jarvis.
description.title: Animal sample from Stegostoma tigrinum (zebra shark) for VGP genome, sSteTig4
